title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
ealed that Grand Duke Ravengard was taken to Gortash's secret command centre. We should rescue him.

Rescue Grand Duke Ravengard.

We reached Gortash's secret command centre - the Iron Throne. Grand Duke Ravengard has to be here somewhere.

Lead Ravengard to safety.

We located Grand Duke Ravengard, but Mizora has no intention of letting us save him. Per the terms of Mizora's bargain, Wyll traded his own freedom for the life of his father. Mizora was true to her word: she helped us lead Grand Du
